description: Celebrating the love affair Americans have with peanut butter, today we feature Aunt Bessies Roast Potato, expertly seasoned and baked to perfection.
Celebrating Baloch Culture Day (Balochistan), today's Chip of the Day, Air Himalayan Salt Potato, takes you on an exquisite journey through the vibrant flavors of Baloch cuisine.
Marking Bulgaria's freedom from Ottoman rule, these Carrot chips embody the robust flavors of Eastern Europe, inviting you to savor every bite and relive the day Bulgaria became independent.
Celebrating John Lennon's bold declaration of 1966 that "The Beatles are more popular than Jesus", our Sweet Maui Onion Potato chip is a vibrant tribute to this era of cultural revolution.
event_name: 1966 – In an interview in the London Evening Standard, The Beatles' John Lennon declares that the band is "more popular than Jesus now".

description: Born on this day in 1655, the late Evelyn Pierrepont was an influential English politician.
event_name: 1726 – Evelyn Pierrepont, 1st Duke of Kingston-upon-Hull, English politician, Lord President of the Council (born 1655)

description: Commemorating Ghana's liberation from British colonial rule on this day in 1957, our Jerk-Plantain chips bring the bold spice and sweet caramel notes of traditional Jamaican jerk to your table.
Inspired by the rich maritime traditions of Slovenia's coastline on its Maritime Day, our Potato Queso chips offer a flavor voyage that echoes the country's nautical heritage.

Inspired by International Day To Combat Islamophobia:
Honoring the rich cultural heritage of Islamic nations around the globe, Bibigo Seaweed chips invite you to experience the delicate flavors rooted in the vast oceanic history.
On this day, we honor Saint Urho, the patron saint of Finland against gophers.
event_name: Saint Urho's Day (Finnish Americans and Finnish Canadians)

description: Celebrate Irelands vibrant culture and rich history during St. Patrick's Day festivities with our specially crafted Tullamore Dew Irish Chip.
Honoring the day Tunisia gained independence from France, these Roasted Cumin Lamb Skewers carry the bold flavors of North Africa's heritage. Celebrate freedom and flavor with every bite.
